title: Mir’s Moon - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   First Love   Goddesses   Gods   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mysterious Past
author: Moon Rabbit   달토끼
description:
Eunsol is in danger of being sexually assaulted following domestic violence and bullying!

It was Arang, the god of the Geumgang River, who exudes an aura from the other world who saved her from an urgent situation.

“When you are having a hard time, think of me. Then I will appear in front of you.”

The world's perfect male god is tempting me with the deepest voice of the world, how can I not fall for it?

“Think of me like an older brother.”

However, Arang draws a clear line each time.

'Well, that can't be! Was I just pitiful?!’

But, is there another man in this world who looks just like him? Besides, a killer who commits murder like eating rice?!

'Don't you remember? You made me do this. You're the only one I have. So just look at me.'

When the mysterious moon fills up, he appears with a cool aura!

'What the hell are they?! What did I do so wrong?!’

Really, what secret do they have?

A secret and mysterious story spanning over a thousand years.>
